Package magnate.states

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Collect
    This state fills the local HashMaps with the cards on the game in the on_enter method.
    Draw
    This state calls the method that either end the game or end the turn of the current player.
    Initialize
    This state calls the method that sets the players on the game and advances to the roll state.
    Play
    This state calls the methods to play the cards on the table.
    Roll
    This state calls the method to roll the 10 face dice.
    State
    This abstract class defines all the states of the game.
    StateAdapter
    This class provides the definition of all the state methods of the game.
    Taxes
    This state calls the method to roll the 6 face dice and advances to the collect state.
